title: 99% Invisible-33- A Cheer for Samuel Plimsoll
description: If you look at the outer hull of commercial ships, you might find a painted circle bisected with a long horizontal line. This marking is called the load line, or as I prefer, the Plimsoll line. This simple graphic design … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
